content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(43.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -82.0) 
-  Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) for storing coal
-  Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) 
-  Burner inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) for transferring coal from the mining drill to the chest
-  Chest at position (44.5, -81.5) 
-  Chest at position (45.5, -80.5) 
-  Chest at position (43.5, -79.5) 

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
-  Make sure the quantity of items to be extracted does not exceed the available quantity in the chest
### Errors when mining with a burner mining drill
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has sufficient fuel to operate
-  Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full to continue mining
### Errors when using a burner inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has sufficient space in the destination chest to transfer items
-  Make sure the source chest has items to be transferred to the destination chest
